definition: to spy upon/to lie in wait for (an opportunity)

sentences.english: There's no suspicion of being shadowed so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，好像还没有疑心到有人窥伺。

sentences.english: She watches him as a cat would watch a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 她顶着他就像猫在窥伺老鼠。

sentences.english: For prying beneath and forcing the lids of sight.
sentences.chinese: 窥伺俯望，拨开视界的眼睑。

sentences.english: And now, it just after hearing stories of little daughter ghost in the watch for?
sentences.chinese: 而此刻，那刚听完故事的小女儿鬼鬼地在窥伺着什么？

definition: to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to covet/to long for/to lust after
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
see 居心叵測|居心叵测[ju1 xin1 po3 ce4]
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to harbor evil intentions (idiom); concealing malice
